lead_paragraph: Southampton have signed French right-back Jeremy Pied on a free transfer following his departure from French side Nice and added Crystal Palace goalkeeper Alex McCarthy for an undisclosed fee.

headline.print_headline: Southampton Sign Defender Pied and Goalkeeper McCarthy
headline.main: Southampton Sign Defender Pied and Goalkeeper McCarthy

snippet: Southampton have signed French right-back Jeremy Pied on a free transfer following his departure from French side Nice and added Crystal Palace goalkeeper Alex McCarthy for an undisclosed fee....
